data.name: Gathering of Gourmets
data.description: A food street with outdoor facilities that replicates the bustle of Chihu Rock.\nTo call this a "gathering of gourmets" is an understatement, and while it may seem that there aren't too many cooking utensils lying around, there are more than enough to cover all the known specialties of the Liyue region. After all, skilled chefs can make delicious dishes with the simplest of utensils, and it certainly helps that many ingredients that don't require complex preparation have become pillars of some of the most renown dishes.

text.text: Awesome! This little street of eateries is pretty similar to Chihu Rock, but if you look closer, there are a lot of differences, too!
Let's go look at different restaurants together and see what makes each place unique, okay?
After that, I'll open another Wanmin Restaurant right here!
Why didn't you tell me about this fancy pad of yours earlier, eh?
Hahaha, there's good wine and fresh food! Good stuff!
Come on, join me! Tell me some stories about your adventures!
Ah, such a rich aroma truly makes you feel refreshed and alive.
I've tasted dishes from both Liuli Pavilion and Xinyue Kiosk, but you can't fully appreciate a country's cuisines if you only stick to high-end restaurants.
I leave it to you to bring me around and taste the local snacks and specialties, alright?
That smell... the fragrance of true Liyue cuisine.
Ahem... you must have put a lot of effort into finding these blueprints for Rain Calmer, yes?
Your liking for Liyue also signifies your approval of my work... Thank you.
Phew! Practice really tuckers me out. Gotta fill up on some food and drink!
Wow, there's a lot of food here. I wanna try out each stall and see which feels the most rock 'n' roll!
You coming? I wanna see what floats your boat.
This food street is great. It really captures that urban feel of Chihu Rock.
You've got to have a proper breakfast to get yourself in the right mood for work.
Also — if you keep an ear open when you're at one of these roadside eateries, you can usually pick up a few useful snippets of information...
Some of the greatest heroes come from the humblest of origins. I think that the same goes for good food too.
There's an intimacy and charm to humble roadside stalls that no fancy restaurant could hope to replicate. Plus, you get to try food from a bunch of different chefs in the same place.
The question is... Which place shall we start with? Any recommendations?

You brought me all the way out here just to show me the food stalls? Well, this was most unnecessary. These recipes look quite elementary — one could just as easily make them in the comfort of one's own home.
Hmm? Oh my, that wonderful aroma...
Ahem... Well, since we're already here, we might as well take a seat and order some delicacies!
